data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Saint John Figtree, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Fig Tree
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Fig Tree, Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint John Figtree.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.focus_label: Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Saint John Figtree that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Saint John Figtree
location.full_name: Saint John Figtree, Saint Kitts and Nevis
